title: DES Shipment
description: A shipment file for the DES simulation

commodities.description: A list of the containers on the ship

EAT.description: The earliest time at which a container or shipment can arrive at its arrival node

LDT.description: The Latest Departure Time (LDT) at which a container may leave the destination node

cargo_categories.description: The type of cargo contained within the container

delay_cost.description: (Not used) The cost incurred (per unit time) for a commodity container arriving later than the latest departure time (LDT) at any location

destination.description: The final destination node for the container

group_uuid.description: A UUID for the container that can be shared with other containers

source.description: The node in the system at which the container departs from the ship

transportation_methods.description: The allowable transportation methods for the container
